integer :: x_initial, tmp, current_x, count

read *, x_initial

tmp = x_initial

current_x =0

count =0

do while (current_x /= 360)

    current_x = current_x + tmp

    if (current_x >360) then

        current_x = current_x -360

    end if

    count = count +1

end do

program main
    implicit none
    integer :: x_initial, tmp, current_x, count
    character(len=10) :: count_str
    integer, dimension(0:9) :: freq
    integer :: oddCount
    character(len=6) :: second_output
    integer, parameter :: M = 1000000007
    character(len=6) :: third_input
    integer :: n
    integer, dimension(0:6, 0:1) :: dp
    integer :: result

    ! Read input
    read *, x_initial

    ! First program logic
    tmp = x_initial
    current_x = 0
    count = 0
    do while (current_x /= 360)
        current_x = current_x + tmp
        if (current_x > 360) then
            current_x = current_x - 360
        end if
        count = count + 1
    end do

    ! Convert count to string
    write(count_str, '(I0)') count
    count_str = adjustl(count_str)

    ! Second program logic
    freq = 0
    oddCount = 0
    do i = 1, len_trim(count_str)
        character :: c = count_str(i:i)
        integer :: num = ichar(c) - ichar('0')
        freq(num) = freq(num) + 1
    end do

    do i = 0, 9
        if (mod(freq(i), 2) == 1) then
            oddCount = oddCount + 1
        end if
    end do

    if ( (oddCount <= 1) .or. (mod(oddCount, 2) == 1) ) then
        second_output = "First"
    else
        second_output = "Second"
    end if

    ! Third program logic
    third_input = second_output
    n = len_trim(third_input)
    dp = 0
    dp(0, 0) = 1

    do i = 0, n-1
        character :: c = third_input(i+1:i+1)
        if (c == '0') then
            dp(i+1, 0) = dp(i, 0)
            dp(i+1, 1) = dp(i, 1)
        else
            dp(i+1, 1) = mod(dp(i, 0) + dp(i, 1), M)
        end if

        if (c == '0') then
            dp(i+1, 1) = mod(dp(i+1, 1) + 2 * dp(i, 1), M)
        else
            dp(i+1, 0) = mod(dp(i+1, 0) + 2 * dp(i, 0), M)
            dp(i+1, 1) = mod(dp(i+1, 1) + 2 * dp(i, 1), M)
        end if
    end do

    result = mod(dp(n, 0) + dp(n, 1), M)
    print *, result

end program main
